summary: Completed comprehensive testing of kiosk app backend APIs and frontend login functionality. All critical endpoints working properly.
passed_tests: API health check (/api/) - returns 200 with 'Kiosk API Ready' message
Menu categories endpoint - returns 4 categories (DOSA, EGG, PARATHA, WAFFLES)
Menu items endpoint - returns 24 menu items with proper structure and pricing
Tables endpoint - returns 100 tables (fallback data source)
Branding config endpoint - returns proper branding config for Hotel Lumiere
Authentication endpoint properly returns 401 for invalid credentials (expected behavior)
Frontend login page loads correctly with all UI elements
Form fields are interactive and responsive
Error handling displays proper toast notifications for invalid login
UI remains stable after login attempts
Both hotel logo and MyGenie branding display correctly
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (6/6 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (login page functionality verified)
